entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending early this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. A few showers beginning this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
